subject: Dear Beloved,
body:
Dear Beloved,
Please kindly pardon me for any inconvenience this letter might have caused you, because I know it may come to you as a surprise as we have no previous correspondence.
I am Mrs.Yvonne Bolton. and i have been suffering from ovarian cancer disease and the doctor says that i have just few days to leave. I am from (Melbourne)Australia, but based in Burkina Faso in West Africa since Nineteen years ago as a business woman dealing with gold exportation and Sales.
Now that I am about to end the race like this, without any family members and no child. I have $2.1 Million US DOLLARS in  African Development-Bank (A.D.B) Burkina Faso which i instructed the bank to give St Andrews Missionary Home here in Burkina Faso. But my mind is not at rest because I am writing this letter now through the help of my computer beside my sick bed.
I also have $6.5 Million US Dollars at BANK OF AFRICA (BOA) here in Burkina Faso and i instructed the bank to release my money to any one who apply for the release and as a foreigner.
Please i want you to be specific on this issue, because this is my WILL and have promise that if you can execute this project, i will offer you 50% of the fund and you will give 50% to the orphanages home in your country for my heart to rest in peace.
Respond to me immediately for further details since I have just few days to end my life due to the ovarian cancer disease, hoping you will understand my pains
Yours fairly friend,
Mrs.Yvonne C .Bolton.

subject: Re:   Dear Beloved,
body:
Hello,

I'm deeply moved by your story and I'm sorry to hear about your health condition. It's admirable that you're thinking of others in such a difficult time. 

You mentioned St Andrews Missionary Home, could you tell me more about this organization? And how did you come to choose them for your donation?

Also, I'm curious about your business in Burkina Faso. How did you end up there from Melbourne, Australia? It must have been quite a journey.

Looking forward to hearing more from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Samuel

subject: From Mrs. Yvonne C. Bolton
body:
Dearest  Samuel

I thank you for your prompt response to my mail, i was touched spiritually
and physically to connect you, with great feelings that you may be a great
help to me and use this money to do the work of GOD for the less
privileges, because whosoever that works in GOD'S vain yard, GOD will also
work on his own. I am a very positive believer and my intuitions have never
deceived me before.About the St Andrews Missionary Home,it was my late
husband that warned me to donate some money to them because it is where he
has been donating when he was alive. As a result,I have the absolute
conviction that you will neither betray me nor disappoint me for my
wishes,rather I am very hopeful that you will give all the maximum
assistance needed to realize this FUND into your account.

For my nationality,I am from Austria and my husband and I run a gold
business here in Burkina Faso.

You may not know the weight of Joy you have brought to my life on this sick
bed and i pray that this joy will never depart from your life and that of
your family because it really took me time,knowing that i have lost the
ability to do anything by myself or move about, even in my condition before
contacting you because i cannot imagine my self leaving my sweat in this
life with the Bank without it reaching the down cast, the motherless and
the orphans because i am one


I am not ignorant of the way you will trust some people and they will
indulge in the act of betraying one's trust forgetting that God is watching
but I strongly believe in you that you will not disappoint me when you will
receive this deposit from the Bank. I intended to build a Charity Home in
my name, YVONNE BOLTON CHARITY FOUNDATION with the fund deposit, which of
course can no longer be fulfilled because of the deteriorating state of my
health. Now, I want you to collect this fund and help me dispatch it to
charity organizations. I will therefore be happy when you will reply me
furnishing me with your contact details orderly like:


YOUR FULL NAME.......................
Your Current Addresses...............
Country or base presently...........
Your telephone numbers..........
Occupation/Position.......
A Scan of Your Passport

Immediately I receive this information, I will give you the Bank Contact
for you to contact them for the fund transfer to your account, while I go
for my operation, which I don't know what will be my faith.

Your Sick Sister,
Mrs. Yvonne C. Bolton

subject: Re: From Mrs. Yvonne C. Bolton
body:
Hello Mrs. Yvonne C. Bolton,

I am deeply moved by your message and the situation you are in. It's truly inspiring to see your dedication towards helping others even in such difficult times. I feel honored that you have chosen me to assist you in this noble cause.

Your late husband's work with St Andrews Missionary sounds commendable, and it's a great idea to continue his legacy through the YVONNE BOLTON CHARITY FOUNDATION.

However, I must apologize as I cannot provide the personal details you requested due to privacy concerns. But rest assured, I am genuinely interested in helping you fulfill your mission of aiding those less fortunate.

Could you please share more about how we can proceed with this? How can we ensure that the funds will be used for the intended purpose? Also, could you tell me more about the charities or organizations that you wish to support?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Samuel

subject: Re: From Mrs. Yvonne C. Bolton
body:
Hello Mrs. Yvonne C. Bolton,

I am deeply moved by your message and the noble cause you are pursuing. It's truly inspiring to see such selflessness, especially in times of personal hardship.

Your late husband's dedication to St Andrews Missionary is commendable and it's clear that his spirit of giving continues through you. I'm humbled by your trust in me and I assure you, I will do my best to assist in this noble endeavor.

The idea of building a charity home under the name "YVONNE BOLTON CHARITY FOUNDATION" is a wonderful one. It would be an honor to help make this dream come true.

However, I must apologize as I cannot provide the personal details you requested due to privacy concerns. But rest assured, this does not affect my willingness or ability to assist with your mission.

Could you please share more about how we can proceed with this? What are the next steps? How can we ensure that the funds reach those who need them most?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Samuel

subject: PLEASE CONTACT THE BANK AND GET BACK TO ME
body:
Dear  Samuel

May the good Lord bless you. Now I know that I have found a trusted person
who I can trust with my money.

I know you must be a good man but I want to tell you that you have shown to
me that you are not just  a Good man,but a God`s fearing person and the
Almighty that brought you to me will favor you.

I have sent a message to the bank that you will be contacting them to know
the possibilities of having my money transferred into your account. So all
you need to do now is to contact the bank and tell them who you are and
tell them that Mrs Yvonne Bolton instructed you to contact them,based on my
money with them.

Whatever they said,you let me know.

Bellow is the bank information

Bank Name; Bank of Africa
Email; b_o_a_oubf@africamail.com
Directors Name; Dr Attan Kizito

Please contact them and get back to me as soon as you hear back from
them,as for my health,the doctor said on Friday next week,I will be
undergoing some exams for the operation. So i don`t know what my faith will
be but even if I did not make it,I know that with you,I will have my money
to be used as I wish. You can Whatsapp my doctor with the following number
+22666998811,he will tell you more about my health. I also need your prayer
everyday God blesses. Almighty will be with me. I will send your number to
him to whatsapp you too.

Yours Sister,
Mrs Yvonne Bolton

subject: Re: PLEASE CONTACT THE BANK AND GET BACK TO ME
body:
Hello Mrs. Yvonne Bolton,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm deeply touched by your trust in me and I pray that the Almighty continues to bless and guide us both.

I understand that you've instructed me to contact the Bank of Africa regarding your money. However, before proceeding, could you please provide more details about this? For instance, what is the purpose of transferring the money into my account? Also, how did you come across my contact information?

Please know that I am here to help in any way I can. Your health is of utmost importance and I will keep you in my prayers.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Samuel

subject: Dear Mr Samuel
body:
Dear Mr Samuel

Thank you once again for your question. For your question, if you read my
first message very well, I told you that I want to donate my fund to a God
fearing person who will help me to fulfill my wish by sharing the money to
the motherless babies homes. So I want you to help and receive the fund and
also complete my wishes.



For your email address, I got t from the International Yellow Page
Directory, but to be honest with you, I got a lot of emails which I contact
four of order ones but from their first reply to me makes me to understand
that what they are after if the money and not to make use of it as I wish.
But you’re different and I remember since I sent the message to you, you
just took your time to read and study the message before replying back to
me.



So for my health, I can give you the number of my doctor so you can contact
him for more details about my health. But one thing I know that I will not
make it, I have a short time to live on this earth, so I want you to help
me and receive this money, no matter what it will cost you, please fight
until you receive it. You will take 50% of the money and take 50% to the
motherless babies’ home.

Yours Sister

Mrs Yvonne Bolton

subject: Re: Dear Mr Samuel
body:
Hello Mrs Yvonne Bolton,

Thank you for your response and the trust you've placed in me. I'm deeply moved by your wish to help the motherless babies homes. It's a noble cause indeed.

I would like to know more about how I can assist in this process. Could you please provide more details? How will the funds be transferred? And what are the steps that need to be taken?

Also, it would be helpful if you could share the contact information of your doctor. It's important for me to understand your health condition better.

Please remember, my primary concern is fulfilling your wishes and ensuring that the funds reach those who need them most.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Samuel

subject: Re: Dear Mr Samuel
body:
Like I told you,further details on how the transfer will be done is the
bank will give you the update. So what you have to do is to contact the
bank as i told you and wait to hear back from them. For my doctor,here is
her phone and whatsapp number +22666998811 and his name is Dr George Tete.

So contact the bank and they will tell you what you need to do for a smooth
and easy transfer okay.

Yours Sister,
Mrs Yvonne Bolton

subject: Re: Dear Mr Samuel
body:
Hello Mrs Yvonne Bolton,

Thank you for your message. It's really interesting to hear about this process. I've never done something like this before, so it's all new to me.

You mentioned a Dr George Tete, is he the person at the bank I should be speaking with? And just to clarify, will he be able to guide me through the entire transfer process?

I'm looking forward to hearing back from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Samuel

subject: Good morning from Mrs Yvonne Bolton.
body:
Dear Mr Samuel

Good morning from Mrs Yvonne Bolton.

Please remember you asked for my doctor's name and his phone number to know
much about my health,so i gave you his name and his phone number. His name
is Dr George Tete and his phone and whatsapp number is +22666998811. The
person you are contacting at the bank that will direct you is Mr Attan
Kizito

subject: Re: Good morning from Mrs Yvonne Bolton.
body:
Hello Mr. Samuel,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your interest in knowing more about my health condition and the doctor who is treating me, Dr. George Tete. However, I'm afraid I can't share his phone number due to privacy reasons.

As for Mr. Attan Kizito at the bank, could you please tell me more about why you need to contact him? Is there any specific information or documents that you require from him?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Samuel
